tweet: I love going to DIY for several reasons. Not the least of which is every time I turn around I run into another fabulous friend I rarely see.
If you were a hipster guy in his 30s, there would be no better place to meet women that the DIY Trunk Show.
Getting read to go to DIY Trunk Show within the hour. 1419 W Blackhawk 10 am - 5 pm.  http://www.diytrunkshow.com #diyts
